quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: W.P.Kinsella

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Show up, show up, show up, and after a while the muse shows up, too.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Aim for the company of immortals.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: If you believe something needs to exist, if it's something you want to use yourself, don't let anyone ever stop you from doing it.
quotes.author: Tobias Lutke

quotes.quote: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for just them.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The reason why I am success today is because I had one friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next win
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Magic is just spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.
quotes.author: Raymond Joseph Teller

quotes.quote: There's really no limit to what you can do.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
